name: 4th International Forum on Aerospace and Aeronautics
content: It is with great pleasure that we welcome all the researchers in the field of Aerospace and Aeronautical Engineering to the 4th International Forum on Aerospace and Aeronautics, which will be held in Budapest, Hungary from November 18-20, 2024\. The aim of AEROFORUM2024 is to be a premier international forum to highlight novel developments, share new ideas, research results, and development experiences, and provide networking opportunities with peers to help establish connections for early-career scientists to meet a diverse mix of researchers, decision-makers to strengthen existing connections and forge new ones.
